patterns: What are some of the special departments for the students in the college?
What are some of the special departments?
responses:
LDCE has a large number of special departments for its students, which include, SSIP, Women Development Cell,Training and placement cell, Anti ragging committie, Aarambh E-cell and a lot more. 
For more information visit the departments sections on the website.

patterns: What facilities does the college has to support entrepreneurship?
Will the college support me if I have an idea for a start-up?
Whom can i contact if I have an Startup idea, for support
responses:
LDCE has various policies to encourage entrepreneurship and start-up culture in the college.
 We have over 150 start-ups currently operating which have been funded by various student support policies 
For more information you can reach out to the SSIP faculty or student coordinator.

patterns: What is the women development policy?
What is the women development cell in the college
Is there any special cell for women development
Any club that focuses on women empowerment and related issues
responses:
LDCE has a dedicated Women Development cell in the college which is active in conducting various workshops, seminars and other events around the year 
Each department has student coordinators representing the cell.
 You can reach out the Women Development cell office for more information.

patterns: How many hostels are there in LDCE
How can I get a room in the LD hostel
Are there any hostels in LD?
How are the hostels in the college
Is there any facility to live, on campus
responses:
LDCE has hostel facilities for both girls and boys on campus.
 Rooms are allocated on the basis of merit list for which there is a seperate application process.
 You can go through the information on the 'hostels' tab on the website for further information.

patterns: Where can I find PG near college?
Is there any PG near college?
responses:
There are many PGs near college providing accomodation following COVID-19 rules. There are also off-campus hostels for both Boys and Girls located in University Area like Samras Hostel etc.
Some of the PGs are providing meal packages as well as tiffin services.
All the necessary requirements of the students are being taken care within reasonable amount.

patterns: What are are the charges of Mess?
responses:
For food services there is a Mess available in college./nFood quality and Hygiene is maintained considering COVID-19 protocols. Cost for the Mess is also affordable which is around 50-60 Rs. Per meal. 
Canteen is also available in college.
